properties.Name: ContractAddendum

Columns.Name: ContractId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Contract.

Columns.Name: ContractAddendumId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Contract Addendum.

Columns.Name: ContractAddendumEffectiveTimestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp which the contract addendum became effective.

Columns.Name: ContractAddendumText
Columns.Description: The text of the Contract Addendum.

Columns.Name: ContractAddendumTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a contract section.

Columns.Name: ContractAddendumNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the contract addendum.
